Date: Monday, 5/1/1992
Subject: Progress of Pedro J. Martinez
Dear Sir,
Pedro J. Martinez is doing pretty good at A Rancho Cucamonga Quakes!
He has an ERA of 2.18, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
